content:
Still hanging around here?
Shouldn't you be getting back to your <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Coordinator</color>?
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话_

content:
Alright then, after that just head back and
talk to your <color=#8AAB4B>coordinator</color> at the Astralink to get everything ready,
and I'll zip right over to you, Wanderer!
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话_

content:
By the time you return to your Astralink
and discuss things with the <color=#8AAB4B>Coordinator</color>,
my martial arts manuals and luggage should be all packed up.
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话_

content:
As for everything else, wait until you get home.
Contact me again after checking the relocation rules
with the <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Coordinator</color>.
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话_

content:
After that, once you've discussed things with the <color=#8AAB4B>Coordinator</color>,
I'll pack my bags as soon as I hear from you,
and hop on the next train to your place. Looking forward to it!
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话_
